title: An unexpected error occured while logging in. WTF
body:
Seriously this messages came up to me about a few weeks ago. I really need help because it's pissing me off. I have tried eveyrthing that I have read. From unistalling and reinstalling about a million times. Also tried using Hexatech repair but that did nothing. I really need a solution because what's r%%%%%ed is that I can log in into my other account and garena works completely fine. Please Riot fix your godamm bugy client. This is not the first bug but this is the worst. I can't do anything. Even though my account is still crap I had memories playing with my friends and this will just really be a bummer. Lot's of people are having the same problem so please Riot update ur client or upload another patch that fixes this.

> **FIX THIS RIOT**

replies.body: It sounds like your connection is blocking you from reaching the authentication server.  Logging into another account might suggest an unstable connection, and it could be a coincidence.  I didn't see anything on your account that would prevent you from logging in.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will take a closer look into this with you.
Hmmmm...I just tried with my other accounts and they seem to be working fine. But thanks for the advice. I hope I get a solution from Riot and hopefully hope I get my account back.
